thread.title: ETF Trader: Global fireworks flare up opportunity
thread.title_full: ETF Trader: Global fireworks flare up opportunity

title: ETF Trader: Global fireworks flare up opportunity
text:
Editor of The ETF Trader Free Preview 
For full access, Log in or Subscribe Now and get 4 weeks free! 
This was another explosive week, where Greece seemed to be at the helm of a pell-mell course that threatened to turtle the global markets … at least that was the sell line of most every headline. 
Let me reiterate my bigger picture view: It remains rationally optimistic. By most measures of economic activity as well as business and consumer confidence, the eurozone economy is improving at a slow-growth rate, while our own economy may be picking up a bit of consumer spending steam. 
Whether it housing, car, or even retail sales, consumers continue to drive our economy’s growth forward rather than in reverse. According to ADP’s private sector jobs report, we saw more jobs created in June (237,000) than in any of the prior five months; jobs are the crux of consumer income, spending, and confidence. To continue reading, please subscribe. Already a Subscriber? Log in
